_description: Example custom object definitions for Salesforce
_note: Custom objects end with __c suffix. Replace these examples with your organization's actual custom objects.

custom_product.label: Custom Product
custom_product.description: Extended product catalog with custom attributes
custom_product.sample_soql: SELECT Id, Name, Product_SKU__c, Product_Category__c, Unit_Price__c, Cost__c, Inventory_Quantity__c, Is_Active__c, Vendor__c, Vendor__r.Name, Launch_Date__c, Description__c, Product_URL__c, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, SystemModstamp FROM CustomProduct__c WHERE IsDeleted = false ORDER BY SystemModstamp ASC

support_ticket.label: Support Ticket
support_ticket.description: Extended support ticket tracking beyond standard Case object
support_ticket.sample_soql: SELECT Id, Name, Related_Case__c, Related_Case__r.CaseNumber, Severity_Level__c, Resolution_Time_Hours__c, Customer_Satisfaction__c, Root_Cause__c, Resolution_Notes__c, SLA_Met__c, Escalated__c, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, SystemModstamp FROM SupportTicket__c WHERE IsDeleted = false ORDER BY SystemModstamp ASC

subscription.label: Subscription
subscription.description: Customer subscription tracking for recurring revenue
subscription.sample_soql: SELECT Id, Name, Account__c, Account__r.Name, Subscription_Type__c, Monthly_Recurring_Revenue__c, Annual_Contract_Value__c, Start_Date__c, End_Date__c, Renewal_Date__c, Status__c, Auto_Renew__c, Cancellation_Reason__c, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, SystemModstamp FROM Subscription__c WHERE IsDeleted = false ORDER BY SystemModstamp ASC
use_cases: Calculate total MRR and ARR across all active subscriptions
Identify subscriptions approaching renewal date for proactive outreach
Analyze churn reasons from cancelled subscriptions
Forecast revenue based on renewal probability

project_milestone.label: Project Milestone
project_milestone.description: Track project implementation milestones linked to opportunities
project_milestone.sample_soql: SELECT Id, Name, Opportunity__c, Opportunity__r.Name, Milestone_Type__c, Planned_Date__c, Actual_Date__c, Status__c, Completion_Percentage__c, Owner_Email__c, Notes__c, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, SystemModstamp FROM ProjectMilestone__c WHERE IsDeleted = false ORDER BY SystemModstamp ASC

naming_conventions.objects: Custom objects must end with __c (e.g., CustomProduct__c)
naming_conventions.fields: Custom fields must end with __c (e.g., Product_SKU__c)

data_modeling.use_master_detail: When child record should be deleted with parent (e.g., Subscription linked to Account)
data_modeling.use_lookup: For optional or independent relationships (e.g., Product linked to Vendor)
data_modeling.external_ids: Mark fields as external IDs for upsert operations (e.g., Product_SKU__c)
data_modeling.indexes: Salesforce automatically indexes custom external ID fields and unique fields

ingestion_tips.describe_api: Use Salesforce Describe API to get latest custom object schemas
ingestion_tips.field_permissions: Ensure integration user has read access to all custom fields
ingestion_tips.relationship_queries: Use __r notation to traverse parent relationships in SOQL
ingestion_tips.bulk_api: Use Bulk API for custom objects with >10K records
ingestion_tips.incremental: Always use SystemModstamp for incremental refresh

simple_custom_object.description: Query custom object with all fields
simple_custom_object.soql: SELECT Id, Name, Custom_Field_1__c, Custom_Field_2__c, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, SystemModstamp FROM CustomObject__c WHERE IsDeleted = false

with_parent_relationship.description: Query custom object with parent Account details
with_parent_relationship.soql: SELECT Id, Name, Account__c, Account__r.Name, Account__r.Industry, Custom_Field__c FROM CustomObject__c WHERE IsDeleted = false

with_child_relationship.description: Query from parent with child custom objects (use subquery)
with_child_relationship.soql: SELECT Id, Name, (SELECT Id, Name, Custom_Field__c FROM CustomChildren__r) FROM Account WHERE Id = '001xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx'

incremental_load.soql: SELECT Id, Name, Custom_Field__c, SystemModstamp FROM CustomObject__c WHERE SystemModstamp > {last_checkpoint} AND IsDeleted = false ORDER BY SystemModstamp ASC
